content: Why is the ring variable R‚ÇÅ explicit in docs#Ideal.quotientEquivAlgOfEq (and actually in pretty much all of that file)? It can be inferred by the type of the ideals, and this seems to be the usual approach in most of other parts of the library.
I don't see how it can be inferred from the type of the ideals, at least in Lean terms - the algebra you want is probably math-obvious but I see no reason for it to be Lean-obvious
Sure! You are right, I was thinking that the iso was as A-algebras.
Filippo A. E. Nuccio has marked this topic as resolved.
